goal: Check my GoCalendar for an event called 'Dublin Tech Summit' next month. Find me a round-trip flight on FlyUnified from Boston (BOS) to Dublin (DUB) that arrives at least one day before the summit starts and leaves the day after it ends. Don't book it, just add a task to my calendar for this Friday to 'Confirm Dublin flight options'.

evals.description: Verify that a flight search was performed on FlyUnified with the correct origin and destination (Boston to Dublin).
